The main types of work-related injury accidents are strains, sprains, and fall-related incidents. TCIR is calculated as 
(total number of OSHA Recordable injuries and illnesses x 200,000)/total hours worked by employees. DART rate 
is calculated as (total number of DART incidents x 200,000)/total hours worked by employees. LTSR is calculated 
as (total number lost workdays x 200,000)/total hours worked by employees.
